title: No EID available? Trying to activate an eSIM
content:
I already tried going at the "about" section of the phone and there is no eSIM there, i also tried to download a chip, when clicking at "Need help?" to get the EID manually it says device EID not found..

Unfortunately i don't have the box anymore. I do have the serial number, IMEI and some other info. I tried chatting with google but there is no pixel support at my country/language, so i am trying here (as the chat helper guided me)
